name: Chicken Shoot Sniper
description:
Download now the best shooting game for free with new idea!
We developed the newest idea of its kind to bring the happiness on your faces
Minimal Game play includes
1.Shoot the Chicks with Multiple guns
2.Switch the Guns by Earning Cash
3.Tough Challenges are ahead and you must have strong Shooting and Aiming Skills to reach the Higher Levels.
4.Shoot on Running Chicks with Precision and Gain points.
5.Enjoy the Chick and Scream out tonight with CHICKEN SHOOT.

Follow us for the latest news and game updates:
https://www.facebook.com/FogRevolution

Get the game now for free and become expert at shooting!
